# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-102">Menambahkan bendera dan pengingat di Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-103">Untuk mengatur atau mengedit pengingat untuk sebuah acara:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-104">Masuk ke [kalender](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-105">Pilih acara yang ingin Anda Ingatkan, lalu pilih panah di sudut kanan atas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-106">untuk mengembangkannya.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-107">Di samping **Ingatkan saya**, pilih waktu pengingat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-108">Outlook.com secara otomatis menyimpan perubahan Anda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-108">Â Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-109">Untuk mengingatkan diri Anda untuk menindaklanjuti pesan, Anda bisa menambahkan bendera tindak lanjut:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-110">Masuk ke [email](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-111">Dalam daftar pesan, Arahkan kursor ke pesan untuk melihat opsi bendera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-112">Pilih ikon bendera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-113">untuk menandai pesan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-114">Untuk melihat semua pesan yang ditandai, pilih tanda centang di sudut kiri bawah halaman untuk masuk ke tugas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="e9ba8-115">Untuk mempelajari selengkapnya, baca [bendera atau Sematkan pesan di Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9ba8-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
